data.text: @kathrynann0504 @Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer You are totally ignorant and wrong. Even Fauci didn’t have a total handle on it. Medicine for this took time to assimilate the data. The  problem was when we started to understand what was going on. Fauci extended the great lie to cover his involvement.
@beachlove734 @Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer I would beg to differ with you, Trump knew how deadly the virus was and lied about it.  900,000 are on him.
@fringe313 @Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer That’s what it’s called in Infectious a disease. Sorry if professional terminology is too much for you.
@resisting2017 @fringe313 @Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer I posted several quotes from different people.  If you don't want to look them up, you don't have to.  Just don't say it didn't happen.

@resisting2017 @fringe313 @Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer So attack my religion and then say I'm a racist.  Excellent job...right out of the playbook. My religion has nothing to do with what I have posted nor have I made any comments regarding race in this thread. Heck, I posted that both sides suck in this thread yet you don't listen.
@beachlove734 @Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer You SOUND like a medical professional...cross-contaminate 🤣🤣🤣🤣

@Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer That’s why her surgeon general left her so abruptly! Don’t think the medical community didn’t notice that. She knew Whitmere switched into campaign role & completely abandoned all things Covid. https://t.co/GrVhJiAGTN
@MSPTrooper21 @resisting2017 @Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer Dude, if you have the quotes then you have the sources. I am doing the work, and YOU are the job I currently have in front of me.

@kathrynann0504 @Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer I’m sickened over the death. Thousands and Thousands! And many of us called her office and warned her. So quite honestly the GOP at least didn’t kill anyone by failed ignorance.
@Tori_Sachs @GovWhitmer Don't you ever get tired of embarrassing yourself Tori Sachs?
